How do I use the `listopenoffers` command to list all closed offers in my wallet?

The `listopenoffers` command is used to list open offers in your wallet, not closed offers. If you want to list all open offers, you can use the command without any arguments, as it defaults to listing both unexpired and expired offers. If you want to list only unexpired or expired offers, you can specify the `unexpired` or `expired` argument, respectively.

listopenoffers (unexpired) (expired)'

Shows offers outstanding in this wallet

Arguments
 unexpired        (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are not expired
 expired         (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are expired

Result
 all open offers
